name: aiorg-plugins
description: Free Claude Code plugins by AI Org - the team behind starter kits for founders

plugins.name: aiorg-todo
plugins.description: Team task board for Claude Code projects. Track tasks, assign to teammates, auto-recognize 'I need to do X' phrases.

plugins.name: aiorg-prd
plugins.description: Interactive PRD designer. Create detailed Product Requirements Documents through guided conversation with Claude as your product partner.

plugins.name: aiorg-changelog
plugins.description: Auto-generate changelog entries from git commits. Narrative JSON for landing pages, classic Markdown for developers.
